Home

Description

Providentia currently has 5 different modes:

  • Interpolation, to interpolate the experiments to the observations networks of your interest.

  • Dashboard, designed to allow on-the-fly analysis of BSC experiment output.

  • Offline reports, designed to obtain complete reports and carry out in-depth analysis of BSC experiment output.

  • Interactive, allowing use of the Providentia backend functions, and use within Jupyter notebooks.

  • Download, to download data from esarchive and Zenodo into your local directories.
